Summary
On the streets of New York, police officer John McClane has just about seen it all. He's got a nose for danger, a penchant for being in the wrong place at the wrong time, and a talent for overcoming incredible odds. But this time, danger is looking for him. Seeking a very personal and mysterious revenge against McClane, a malevolent genius named Simon is forcing the heroic cop to play a deadly game. The stakes: New York City itself. The game begins when a phone call from Simon sends McClane to Harlem, where he unexpectedly forms an alliance with the very unwilling Zeus Carver. McClane and Zeus soon find themselves careening across the Big Apple, pursuing the deadly Simon, who's always one step ahead of them. In the past, McClane's had his share of bad days. But on this blisteringly hot summer day in the City, Simon Says John McClane is about to have a really bad day...

Watch and Create High Quality Nero Digital Video with NeroVision Express

Nero Digital is a video format based on the same video compression technology that the TV and movie industries use to make your digital video experience better than ever. This state-of-the art codec (short for compressor-decompressor) is ideal for creating high-quality video files at a fraction of the original size so they can be enjoyed on PCs, TVs, and mobile devices.

Nero Digital videos are created using open standard codecs as adopted by the HD broadcasting standard as well as new HD technologies like AVCHD, Blu-ray, and HD DVD, as well as online video compression technologies adopted by the online video community.

Nero Digital videos can be viewed on a PC with Nero ShowTime, or on Nero Digital-certified DVD players, set-top boxes, digital TVs, and DMAs.Nero Digital files also play with basic audio and video functionality on any open standard players such as the PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, iPod, or software players such as QuickTime or Adobe Flash Player 9 (with MPEG-4 support).
Nero Digital video features include:

* Multiple languages, including subtitles
* Convenient video navigation through chapters
* Playback on many different devices, supporting screen sizes
  from mobile phone resolutions up to HD TVs
* Excellent video and audio quality, using a fraction of the disc space.
